SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPThemeView

java.lang.Object
  RelativeLayout
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPThemeView

public final class WPThemeView
extends RelativeLayout

Layout that sets package^-wide theme WPTheme.themeColor. This handles calling the necessary methods to save the user's color preference. It displays a simple list of color options that will be chosen when the user clicks on one.

^ I say "package-wide" meaning that the value is saved on the user's SD card for any application using this package to set, this way when one application using this package sets the preference, then all applications using this package are updates justly.

Change log: Version 1.01

  • Removed scroll fading edge.
Version 1.02
  • OnAccentSelectedListener
  • Accent title view for localization
Version 1.03
  • Scaled by density.
  • Changes colors based on WPTheme.
Version 1.04
  • Synchronization is optional (set using Java or XML).
  • Now using new dynamic WPTheme stuff so you can add your own colors!
  • Broadcasting Intent action for when the state changes.
Version 1.05
  • New ACTION_ACCENT_CHANGED to notify other apps so that they may attempt to synchronize the accent color choice.
Version 2.0
  • TileAnimation now used on individual rows!
  • Added "animate" XML attribute to disable tile animations (enabled by default).
Version 2.1
  • Added "accentTitle" XML attribute.

Since:
06-06-2012

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_ACCENT_CHANGED

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_ACCENT_CHANGED
Intent broadcast to notify the system that the accent color has been changed for this application. This should only be broadcasted if the accent color is one of the default values in WPTheme. It should also contain data including whether or not the theme is "dark" as well as the package name of the sender and more.

See Also:

setSynchronized

public final void setSynchronized(boolean sync)
Set whether or not to synchronize the accent color preference with a stored file on the SD card. Can also be set using the `synchronized` XML attribute.

isSynchronized

public final boolean isSynchronized()
Returns:
True if syncrhonized.

setOverScrollMode

public static final boolean setOverScrollMode(View mView,
                                              int mMode)
Note: this method is left for compatibility reasons, but you should use ViewUtils.setOverScrollMode directly if possible.

Calls the setOverscrollMethod on mView. Reflection is used because this Method is only available in Android 2.3 GingerBread+.

Parameters:
mView - The view to set the mode to.
mMode - The mode to set for mView.
Returns:
True if the method was called successfully.
